mapper.insert: insert into user (username, password, name, nickname, avatar_url, phone, role, status, auth_type, github_username, create_time, update_time) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{avatarUrl}, #{phone}, #{role}, #{status}, #{authType}, #{githubUsername}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select:
select * from user
and (name like concat('%', #{name}, '%') or nickname like concat('%', #{name}, '%'))
order by create_time desc
